bodydiv.p: The Board might need to consider whether any IFRS Standards should be amended to reflect revisions to the Conceptual Framework. However, amending a Standard is not an automatic consequence of such revisions. Changes to Standards address deficiencies in financial reporting. Any changes to the Conceptual Framework that highlight inconsistencies in the Standards are considered by the Board in the light of other priorities when developing or modifying the work plan.
